questions.question: Is VanLang Budget free?
questions.answer: Yes, VanLang Budget is completely free for all users. You can use all the basic features without paying.

questions.question: How do I start using VanLang Budget?
questions.answer: It's simple! Just sign up for an account, log in, and start adding your income and expenses. The app will automatically generate reports and charts for you to track.

questions.question: Is my data safe?
questions.answer: We take security seriously. All your data is encrypted and only you can access it. We never share your personal information with third parties.

questions.question: Can I use VanLang Budget on my phone?
questions.answer: Yes, VanLang Budget is a responsive web application that works well on all devices including computers, tablets, and mobile phones.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: The journey of VanLang Budget
about.description: VanLang Budget was developed by a team of finance enthusiasts with the goal of helping people manage their finances more effectively.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To help people achieve financial freedom through intelligent and intuitive financial management tools.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become Vietnam's leading personal finance management application, helping millions of people control their spending, save effectively, and achieve their financial goals.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.content: We believe financial management shouldn't be complicated. VanLang Budget is designed with an intuitive interface that's easy for everyone to use.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.content: We're always clear about how your data is used and protected. No hidden fees, no intrusive ads.

support.title: Support
support.content: We're committed to supporting users throughout their financial journey, from setting up budgets to achieving long-term goals.

ceo.name: Nguyen Manh Dung
ceo.bio: With a passion for technology and personal finance, Nguyen Manh Dung has led the VanLang Budget development team from concept to product.

cto.name: Pham Nhat Hoang

expenseTracking.title: Expense Tracking
expenseTracking.description: Record and categorize all your daily, weekly, and monthly income and expenses with an intuitive and easy-to-use interface.
benefits: Easily add new expenses with just a few simple steps
Automatic categorization based on common categories
Add location, images, and notes for each transaction
Filter and search expenses by various criteria

budgetManagement.title: Budget Management
budgetManagement.description: Set up and track spending budgets by category, helping you control your expenses and form healthy financial habits.
benefits: Set up monthly or batch-based budgets
Alert when spending exceeds budget
Analyze budget compliance over time
Adjust budgets based on actual data

financialAnalysis.description: Detailed charts and reports help you understand your spending habits and savings opportunities.
benefits: Visual charts of income and expenses
Analysis of financial trends over time

Identify key spending categories and savings opportunities

Regular reminders and encouragement

changes.title: 7. Changes to Terms

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: VanLang Budget is committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of users. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

dataCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
items: Personal information: name, email, password, phone number (if any).
Financial information: expenses, income, budgets, loans, investments.
Device information: IP, browser type, login information.
Usage history: login times, user actions.

usagePurpose.title: 3. Purpose of Use
items: Provide and operate personal financial management services.
Send notifications, reminders (budgets, loans...).
Improve user experience and technical support.
Analyze anonymous data for internal research purposes.

dataProtection.title: 4. Personal Information Protection
items: User passwords are encrypted using bcrypt algorithm.
Data transmission uses secure HTTPS protocol.
Authentication tokens (JWT) are used to ensure secure access.

userRights.title: 5. User Rights
items: Have the right to access, edit, or delete your personal information.
Can request export of all personal data.
Can request permanent deletion of account and data.

dataSharing.title: 6. Data Storage and Sharing
items: Data is stored on our secure servers.
We do not share personal information with third parties, except when required by law enforcement.
Data may be used anonymously for statistical purposes.

policyChanges.title: 7. Policy Changes
policyChanges.content: We have the right to change the privacy policy at any time. Users will be notified if there are important changes.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction to Cookies
introduction.content: Cookies are small files stored on your device when you access VanLang Budget. They help us improve user experience and provide better services.

typesOfCookies.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
items: Essential cookies: Ensure the website functions properly (login, security).
Performance cookies: Collect information about how you use the website.
Functional cookies: Remember your preferences (language, theme).
Analytics cookies: Help us understand user behavior to improve services.

essentialCookies.title: 3. Essential Cookies
items: Authentication tokens (JWT): Maintain secure login sessions.
CSRF Token: Protect against cross-site attacks.
Session ID: Manage user work sessions.
Security cookies: Ensure security during data transmission.

functionalCookies.title: 4. Functional Cookies
items: Language: Remember your chosen language (Vietnamese/English).
Theme: Save interface preferences (Light/Dark mode).
Display options: Remember how you want to display data.
Notification settings: Store your notification preferences.

analyticsCookies.title: 5. Analytics Cookies
items: Access statistics: Count number of users and pages viewed.
User behavior: Understand how users interact with the application.
Performance: Track page load speed and system errors.
UX improvement: Data to optimize user experience.

thirdPartyCookies.title: 6. Third-Party Cookies
items: Vercel Analytics: Track website performance (if enabled).
CDN Services: Optimize page load speed.
Font Services: Google Fonts or other font services.
API Services: Cookies from integrated API services.

cookieManagement.title: 7. Cookie Management
items: You can delete cookies through browser settings.
Disabling cookies may affect some website features.
Essential cookies cannot be disabled to ensure security.
You can contact us for more details.

dataRetention.title: 8. Storage Duration
items: Session cookies: Deleted when browser is closed.
Persistent cookies: Stored from 30 days to 1 year.
Authentication tokens: Expire after 7 days of inactivity.
Preference cookies: Stored long-term until user deletes.

importantNote.title: Important Note
importantNote.content: Disabling cookies may affect your VanLang Budget experience. Some features like login, saving settings, and security may not work properly. We recommend only disabling non-essential cookies.

cookieBanner.title: We Use Cookies
cookieBanner.description: VanLang Budget uses cookies to improve your experience, provide relevant content and analyze traffic. By continuing to use the website, you agree to our use of cookies.
cookieBanner.learnMore: Learn more about our cookie policy →

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic website operation (login, security)

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use the website to improve services

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Personalize advertising and track campaign effectiveness
